title: Why is My Energy Bill Even Higher?
description: It is encouraging that opposition parties have started to challenge the Net Zero orthodoxy. The Green Blob should be left in no doubt that the trolley bus has been diverted and it is coming for it. Time to get out of the way.
content:
From THE DAILY SCEPTIC
by David Turver
Ofgem recently announced the price cap for the first quarter of 2026 and, despite gas prices falling, the overall price cap has gone up. The Budget has made s… [+15476 chars]
